name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another perspective

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Handan, Hebei, a young man chose to park his car on the road and hanged himself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Army Day, 30,000 netizens collectively paid tribute to the Kuomintang soldiers under a video of the Communist Party vs. the Kuomintang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that a beef farm in Qiji Town, Liaocheng City, Shandong Province, had found anthrax cases, the county hospital was sealed off, and the infected meat had been circulated in the market. An official notice circulated online stated that on July 27, four animal anthrax positives were found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 1, Chongqing. A man reported Xiushan County Yujiao Jingfeng Food Co., Ltd. under his real name. The reporter said that the company was responsible for the distribution of nutritious meals to all primary and secondary schools and kindergartens in the county. From September 2022 to June 2023, the pork distributed included low-quality pork such as frozen pork and spoiled meat. 
Xiushan County Education Committee: A special team was formed to conduct an investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 1, Guangzhou, Guangdong. It was reported online that a food delivery boy committed suicide because his account was blocked due to complaints from customers, which made it impossible for him to receive orders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Brother Feng was on the run after the court session and described the details of the trial, and showed netizens a lot of evidence about Gu Yan Mu Chan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of now, many discussion topics related to online certificates and online accounts on Weibo have been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 27th local time, in the women's individual epee gold medal competition at the Paris Olympics, Hong Kong athlete Jiang Minhui won the first gold medal for the Hong Kong delegation. Because the flag of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region was raised on the scene, Jiang Minhui did not sing along with the national anthem when it was played, which aroused dissatisfaction and doubts from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ten departments in Shandong Province issued the "Opinions on the Handling of Issues Related to the Transformation of Provincial Institutions into Enterprises"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, in Chengdu, Sichuan, two new energy vehicles collided and caught fire. After the fire was extinguished, the on-site staff immediately covered one of the vehicles with a black cloth. Netizens said the vehicles involved were Huawei Seres and NIO.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shandong citizen sues the Ministry of Public Security over online identity authentication
On August 2, Mr. Fu Wen, a citizen of Weifang, Shandong, sued the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China in the Dongcheng District Court of Beijing over the launch of the "National Online Identity Authentication" APP.
The reason is that the "National Online Identity Authentication Public Management Measures" is still in the stage of soliciting opinions, but the Ministry of Public Security has implemented the national online identity authentication public service based on a regulation that has not yet come into effect.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Keijiro Daily: Invest in China and share prosperity. China will never be absent from the list of the world's most valuable investments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens discovered that Lao Dongyan and Hu Xijin’s latest Weibo posts were both on July 27.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 31, a recruitment information of Guizhou Tobacco Monopoly Bureau for account managers attracted attention. The recruitment information showed that sports major + second-level athlete certificate were required. Some people questioned that such a position was a "carrot pit". On August 1, Guizhou Tobacco Bureau responded: It is legal and compliant. 
The public page shows that Guizhou Tobacco Monopoly Bureau had previously recruited performance and broadcasting and hosting majors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, Zhang Yongtie, a Hebei NPC deputy, Langfang CPPCC Standing Committee member, and entrepreneur, reported Liu Xuewen, deputy director of the Yanjiao High-tech Zone Management Committee of Sanhe City, Hebei Province, under his real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 31, data from the China Index Academy showed that from January to July 2024, the total sales of the top 100 real estate companies was 2390.94 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 40.1%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, Suzhou issued a report on the incident in which Ma Xiangyu reported the director of the Suzhou Industrial Park Commerce Bureau under his real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, Weibo released the 28th issue of this week's safety tips. A blogger has been banned for posting pro-American remarks and making inappropriate comparisons with domestic situations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Mysterious power from the East"
On August 1, local time, in the men's singles quarter-finals of the Paris Olympics, Fan Zhendong of the Chinese team defeated Tomokazu Harimoto of the Japanese team 4:3 and advanced to the men's singles semi-finals. Some Chinese netizens knelt down and kowtowed to cheer for the Chinese table tennis team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, a car accident occurred in Pulandian District, Dalian, Liaoning, causing damage to many vehicles and casualties. The scene was in a mess. The official report: 1 death and 3 injuries, the accident was caused by the failure of the brake system of the truck involved in the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Nanyang, Henan, a big V broke the news online that Lei Ke, the head of the Henan branch of China Children and Teenagers' Fund and a volunteer of 9958, tricked the mother of a sick child into sleeping with him before giving her donations. A netizen said: "Lei asked the mother of the sick child to sleep with him once, and then gave her some donations. She slept with him again, and then gave her some more donations, until she dragged the sick child to death and swallowed the donations." In the exposed screenshots of the chat between Lei Ke and the mother of the sick child, Lei Ke said bluntly: "I love you, I will love you forever."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 1, the National Health Insurance Bureau: Set a waiting period for benefits for those who stop paying for medical insurance and those who fail to join the insurance on time.
Netizens responded, "How can we make them believe that we stopped paying because we have no money?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, in Foshan, Guangdong, the owners of Evergrande Yujingwan Community reported that the property management company had raised parking fees arbitrarily, and the owners gathered together to protest and protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 1, Huizhou, Guangdong. A truck driver posted a video saying that a group of people claiming to be from the joint defense department stopped them in a private car that night, and took away the truck driver's car keys without showing their ID.
As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, a car hit pedestrians near Jixiang Metro Station in Longgang District, Shenzhen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On-site monitoring screen

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CWwovgk57T

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The person who hung the Sitong Bridge banner on the flyover in Xinhua County, Loudi, Hunan, was a 22-year-old local youth, Fang Yirong.
In the video, he said that tyranny is bound to be terrible, but authority cannot overwhelm people's hearts. No matter how much Xi Jinping persecutes us, he cannot stop democratic ideas from taking root in the hearts of Chinese people again and again.
The water of the Yangtze River will not flow back. I hope that the Chinese people can get rid of autocracy as soon as possible and live a better life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
